description:
Shooting Stars and Zoobles: One night, Panky notices a strange shooting star that fell from the sky and knocked him out. Em came to his house to tell him about the shooting star before he left. Chevy and Panky later arrived and told him about, later decided the three to go to the shooting star summit to ride with the stars, until they encountered the Black Candies once again. Blacky challenges them to a race as to see who`s the fastest star rider, in which Chevy agrees.
Silvy the Model: One day, Coron and Panky were reading some magazines about Silvy, a Melon flavored Tabby Cat Zooble until they accidentally rip a page. Chevy arrived later on as they talked about her until they noticed a huge crowd of Zoobles in the Rainbow Park surrounding Silvy as both Coron and Panky joins in. However, Silvy herself wanted to get away from the crowd and her fans due to too much pressure and its up to Chevy and Coron to distract everyone so Silvy can take a day off. But when Silvy gets sick the next day, its up to the three to do something to fill up her shoes.

titles.title: Nagareboshi to Zoobles / Model no Silvy
Shooting Stars and Zoobles / Silvy the Model
流れ星とズーブルズ / モデルのシルビー
